languages.text: В колонии разгорается пламя бунта. Уставшие от поборов и наказаний, подданные призывают отказаться от протекции Вольного Торговца!
The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.
languages.original_text: В колонии разгорается пламя бунта. Уставшие от поборов и наказаний, подданные призывают отказаться от протекции Вольного Торговца!

traits.locale_text: The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.
The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.
The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

languages.text: La révolte gronde dans la colonie. Lassés des extorsions et des châtiments, les sujets incitent leurs pairs à abandonner la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

traits.locale_text: La révolte gronde dans la colonie. Lassés des extorsions et des châtiments, les sujets incitent leurs pairs à abandonner la protection {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 反乱の炎はコロニー中に広まった。強要と制裁に嫌気がさした臣民たちは、仲間たちに自由開拓者の庇護を捨てるよう促す。
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

traits.locale_text: 反乱の炎はコロニー中に広まった。強要と制裁に嫌気がさした臣民たちは、仲間たちに自由開拓者の庇護を捨てるよう促す。

languages.text: 叛乱的火苗在殖民地蔓延。厌倦了勒索与惩罚的民众揭竿而起，敦促他们的同胞站出来，一起反抗行商浪人的统治。
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

traits.locale_text: 叛乱的火苗在殖民地蔓延。厌倦了勒索与惩罚的民众揭竿而起，敦促他们的同胞站出来，一起反抗行商浪人的统治。

languages.text: Las llamas de la rebelión estallan por toda la colonia. Hartos de las extorsiones y los castigos, los súbditos instan a sus camaradas a abandonar el patrocinio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

traits.locale_text: Las llamas de la rebelión estallan por toda la colonia. Hartos de las extorsiones y los castigos, los súbditos instan a sus camaradas a abandonar el patrocinio de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Die Flammen der Rebellion entzünden sich in der gesamten Kolonie. Die Untertanen sind die Ausbeutung und die Strafen leid, sie drängen ihre Mitbürger, sich aus der Herrschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu befreien.
languages.original_text: The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

traits.locale_text: Die Flammen der Rebellion entzünden sich in der gesamten Kolonie. Die Untertanen sind die Ausbeutung und die Strafen leid, sie drängen ihre Mitbürger, sich aus der Herrschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu befreien.
